about_the_game:
OVERRIDER is an adrenaline-pumping action-adventure roguelite that combines the high-speed thrills of SSX, Sonic the Hedgehog, and Tony Hawk. Join Vihra, a young and skilled hoverboard rider, as she races through a post-apocalyptic world overrun by robots, uncovering its mysteries and fighting to stop the invasion.

Hoverboard Gameplay

The fans on Vihra's hoverboard can reverse the air flow in a snap allowing her to go down slopes really fast. Make use of this mechanic to respond to the terrain beneath and build up momentum. Grind rails to get to new locations or to avoid danger. Get big air times and perform tricks to charge your hover board.

Objectives

Find what's causing the invasion and stop it. Tackle robots at high speeds and gather resources. Upgrade your hoverboard and skills to become harder, better, faster and stronger. Explore ruins and find your way into abandoned facilities as you uncover the reason why the civilization has fallen. Find hidden stashes and meet various helpful characters along the way. Complete timed challenges and put your skills to the test.

Gameplay Freedom

OVERRIDER offers open procedurally generated post-apocalyptic worlds. Where you can go is only restricted by your skills. Take any direction and see where it leads you. Every time you come back to OVERRIDER there is a new world to explore. A variety of gear is available to unlock and each item provides different gameplay possibilities to accommodate various play styles.

Wishlist the game and join or to support the development.
